word: AMID THE GENERAL APOSTASY THERE WERE SOME WHO MAINTAINED THEIR ALLEGIANCE TO JEHOVAH; AND FROM AMONG THESE, GOD CHOSE PROPHETS WHOM HE COMMISSIONED TO CALL THE PEOPLE TO REPENTANCE, AND TO WARN THEM OF THE EVILS THAT THEIR COURSE WOULD SURELY BRING UPON THEM. "THE LORD GOD OF THEIR FATHERS SENT TO THEM BY HIS MESSENGERS, RISING UP BETIMES, AND SENDING; BECAUSE HE HAD COMPASSION ON HIS PEOPLE, AND ON HIS DWELLING PLACE." 2 CHRONICLES 36:15.
